Event.name: Employment_start
Event.definition: <def-root>This is a non-perspectivized frame representing the initial stage of the Employment_scenario: the formation of the employment relationship between the <fen>Employer</fen> and the <fen>Employee</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Employee
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who enters an employment relationship with an <fen>Employer</fen>, thereby obligating themself to perform assigned <fen>Task</fen>s in order to receive <fen>Compensation</fen> .</def-root>

Arg.name: Employer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person (or institution) that enters an employment relationship with an <fen>Employee</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Compensation
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Compensation</fen> is the payment that the <fen>Employee</fen> receives for performing assigned <fen>Task</fen>s in the course of their employment.</def-root>

Arg.name: Field
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Field</fen> which the <fen>Employee</fen> enters as they take up employment with the <fen>Employer</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which the employment relationship between an <fen>Employer</fen> and an <fen>Employee</fen> comes about.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the place where the <fen>Employer</fen> and the <fen>Employee</fen> enter into the employment relationship. </def-root>

Arg.name: Position
Arg.definition: <def-root>The label given to a particular type of employment.</def-root>

Arg.name: Task
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Task</fen> identifies the assignment that the <fen>Employee</fen> is obligated to do when she enters the employment relationship with the <fen>Employer</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when an <fen>Employer</fen> and an <fen>Employee</fen> establish an employment relationship.</def-root>
